** Dinobot growled as his scanners finally found Tavatron, defending herself 
and attacking towards Reflector. The enemy.
However, the order had been to cease-fire and from what his scans brought in 
from the remainder of the field, many Alliance members had done just that 
and gathered around FZ's position. Yet there were only a few Maximals around 
the commanders. Which spoke plenty about Maximal faith.
Dinobot didn't like the Maximals now. They were too weak, but only because 
they didn't know the meaning of war. That numbers were far more important 
then how one could fight. They also fought alone, where pairs would be much 
better. Why else did Tavatron and himself stay close? Besides the company.
His mind once again on track with Tavatron he looked towards her position, 
finding that she was a bit more damaged this time. Though he was sure that 
she was probably sick of him coming to the rescue.
But once he had seen her draw back with her staff he began to walk towards 
the commanderï¿½s position. Not simply because she had ordered it, but to get 
right into the fighting if it began again...and most of the Alliance was 
there with FZ now.
He was tense and injured, which made him rather dangerous if one would be 
smart and realize it.
Dinobot passed Tavatron by a few meters, not looking towards her but 
continuing on his way towards the growing crowd. His optics continuously 
trained on the enemy as he drew closer. **
